Package it.polimi.ingsw.View.GUI.Application

Class BoardPane

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
javafx.scene.layout.StackPane
it.polimi.ingsw.View.GUI.Application.BoardPane
All Implemented Interfaces:
ObservableGUI, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class BoardPane extends javafx.scene.layout.StackPane implements ObservableGUI
This class represents the player's board. It contains the entrance, the dining room with the professor space, and the tower space,

  • Property Summary

    • compareGridSpot

      private final Comparator<javafx.util.Pair<Integer,Integer>> compareGridSpot
      Comparator function for determining the first available spot in a free spots list. Between two spots, it will favor the one that is closer to the top. If they are both on the same row it will favor the one that is closer to the left. Comparing all spots in a space thus means that they should be filled from left to right and from top to bottom.

    • observer

      private ObserverGUI observer
      The observer of this GUI element.

    • tableChosen

      private int tableChosen
      The table chosen by the user through clicking.

    • studentChosen

      private int studentChosen
      The student chosen by the user through clicking.

  • Constructor Details

    • BoardPane

      public BoardPane(int nickID, double boardHeight)
      Constructor for the class. It creates the grid with the right spacing between elements, and the image of the board underneath.
      Parameters:
      nickID - the index of the PlayerPane that has this BoardPane
      boardHeight - the height of the board

    • createGrid

      private void createGrid(javafx.scene.layout.GridPane toCreate, double widthPct, int rows, int columns, double paddingHPct, double paddingVPct, double paddingExtraRightPct)
      Utility function for creating a GridPane with the given dimensions and size constraints.
      Parameters:
      toCreate - the GridPane to set up
      widthPct - the percentage of the board's width that this GridPane will occupy
      rows - the number of rows
      columns - the number of columns
      paddingHPct - the left and right padding, as percentage of the board's width
      paddingVPct - the top and bottom padding, as percentage of the board's height
      paddingExtraRightPct - an additional extra padding on the right, needed for certain grids

    • createEntrance

      public void createEntrance(int entranceID)
      Creates the entrance space with the given StudentContainerPane ID.
      Parameters:
      entranceID - the ID of the entrance space

      public void createDiningRoom(HashMap<Color,Integer> tableIDs)

      Parameters:
      tableIDs - a hashmap of the StudentContainerPane ID associated with each table color

    • updateEntrance

      public void updateEntrance(HashMap<Integer,Color> students)
      Updates the entrance space with the updated students. It is equivalent to calling removeOldStudentsFromEntrance and addNewStudentsToEntrance
      Parameters:
      students - a hashmap with the student IDs and their respective color

    • removeOldStudentsFromEntrance

      private void removeOldStudentsFromEntrance(HashMap<Integer,Color> students)
      Method for removing from the entrance those students that are not present in the given updated list of students.
      Parameters:
      students - a hashmap with the student IDs and their respective color

    • addNewStudentsToEntrance

      private void addNewStudentsToEntrance(HashMap<Integer,Color> students)
      Method for adding to the entrance those students that weren't present before, but are present in the updated list of students.
      Parameters:
      students - a hashmap with the student IDs and their respective color

    • updateTable

      public void updateTable(Color tableColor, List<Integer> students)
      Updates the table of the given color with an updated list of students sitting on it. It is equivalent to calling removeOldStudentsFromTable and addNewStudentsToTable.
      Parameters:
      tableColor - the color of the table to update
      students - a list of the student IDs on that table

    • removeOldStudentsFromTable

      private void removeOldStudentsFromTable(Color tableColor, List<Integer> students)
      Method for removing from the table of the given color those students that are not present in the given updated list of students.
      Parameters:
      tableColor - the color of the table to update
      students - a list of the student IDs on that table

    • addNewStudentsToTable

      private void addNewStudentsToTable(Color tableColor, List<Integer> students)
      Method for adding to the table of the given color those students that weren't present before, but are in the updated list of students.
      Parameters:
      tableColor - the color of the table to update
      students - a list of the student IDs on that table

    • updateProfessors

      public void updateProfessors(List<Color> newProfessorsOwned)
      Updates the professor space with an updated list of the owned professors.
      Parameters:
      newProfessorsOwned - a list of the colors of the professors present on this board

    • updateTowers

      public void updateTowers(int newNumOfTowers)
      Updates the tower space with the new number of towers owned.
      Parameters:
      newNumOfTowers - the number of towers present on this board
